players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Bob is acting suspiciously tonight. Let's watch him closely."
Charlie: "I agree with Bob that we should keep an eye on him, but let's not jump to conclusions just yet. We still have a lot of information to gather before making any decisions."
You: "I will continue to act normal and see if anyone suspects me. I don't want to give away my identity just yet."
Charlie: "Let's try to gather more information about Alice's death before making any accusations. We don't want to make a false accusation and risk losing a valuable player."
Diana: "Based on the information we have gathered so far, it seems that Bob was involved in Alice's death. Let's consider voting him out to keep our community safe."
